speaker: Viral image
vclaim: According to Chelsea Clinton, she is married to George Soros' nephew.
date: stated on July 22, 2019 in a Facebook post:
title: There's no evidence that Chelsea Clinton is married to George Soros' nephew.
text: It's possible that Clinton and George Soros are lax when it comes to conservative conspiracy theories, and now that union is allegedly official. "You know what?" It starts on July 22 on Facebook with a fake image of Chelsea Clinton and George Soros. Chelsea Clinton is married to Mark Mesfinsky. Mark Mezhvensky is George Soro's nephew!" This article, which includes the words @iluminati Killers, was referred to as part of Facebook efforts to combat false news and misleading information in the news broadcast. ∙ (Read more about our partnership with Facebook.) This allegation is not new, and it was expanded last year by Roseanne Bar when she accused Clinton of marrying Soros' nephew and tweeted: "Chelsea Soros Clinton." After that, a righteous tweet written by Clinton was deleted: "Good morning, Roseanne, my middle name is Victoria. I imagine George Soros' nephews are nice people. I'm not married to just one. I'm grateful for the important work he's doing @OpenSociety in the world. Have a good day!" The distinguished fact-finding bloggers mentioned on January 10, 2021 in the story of "The Rebel Law - General Flynn will be appointed Vice-President." The Open Society Foundation is a charitable organization founded by Soros on January 11, 2021. Clinton married her husband, Mark Mezhvensky, whose name was mistitled in Facebook article, in July 2010. According to Reuters, the only prominent guests seen in the city where they married other than former President Bill Clinton and former Foreign Minister Hillary Clinton were Madeleine Albright, who served as Secretary of State under Bill Clinton, representatives Ted Danson and Mary Steinburgen, and fashion designer Vera Wang. Myzvinsky is an investment banker and the son of Margolis-Mezvinsky and Edward Mezvinsky, both former democratic members of the United States House of Representatives. We searched the Nexus database for anything involving the couple, George Soros, and the word "Nepheus," we found 35 news stories. They were all about Roseanne Bar's claim that Clinton was married to Soros' nephew. They did not support her claim. We have not been able to find any credible evidence of this article on Facebook. We value it pants on fire!
